archimate:Capability.name: Customer Order Capture
archimate:Capability.documentation: The Customer Order Capture function registers the orders independently of the sales channel used (internal distribution such as Telco Points of Sales, Outsourcer, external distribution such as Dealer, Reseller�, Telco Call Centres, Customer Self-Service, or the medium used (face-to-face, phone, Web/Wap, email, mail/ fax�). It can concern a new commercial offer order (for a new or an existing customer), the update of installed offer, products or the termination of some installed offers or products�
